title: The Third Foolish Virgin
marks: Signature bottom edge, center, in the print: [M + S]
description: standing young woman with long curly hair, wiping her PR eye with her hand; woman holds a cone-shaped lamp in her PL hand; wreath of flowers at woman\'s feet in LLC
